DOC.brief_summary: The study examines time spent in the emergency room on admission of patients with hip fracture in a cohort with a traditional setup compared with a prospective cohort with a fast track admission schedule including nurse initiation of treatmnet, standardized analgesia, fluid and oxygen therapy and standardized logistics for x-ray and admission procedures.
DOC.brief_title: Fast Track Admittance of Hip Fracture Patients
DOC.criteria: Admission with a primary hip fracture
